name: chunked-dc
description: Binary chunking for WebRTC data channels.

scripts.build: npm run build_code && npm run build_tests
scripts.dist_es2015: browserify -p tsify src/main.ts -p [ browserify-header --file header.js ] --standalone chunked-dc -o dist/chunked-dc.es2015.js
scripts.dist_es2015_min: browserify -p tsify -t [ babelify --presets babili --extensions .ts ] -p [ browserify-header --file header.js ] src/main.ts --standalone chunked-dc -o dist/chunked-dc.es2015.min.js
scripts.dist_es5: browserify -p tsify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --extensions .ts ] -p [ browserify-header --file header.js ] src/main.es5.ts --standalone chunked-dc -o dist/chunked-dc.es5.js
scripts.dist_es5_min: browserify -p tsify -t [ babelify --presets es2015 --extensions .ts ] -p [minifyify --no-map] -p [ browserify-header --file header.js ] src/main.es5.ts --standalone chunked-dc -o dist/chunked-dc.es5.min.js
scripts.dist: npm run dist_es2015 && npm run dist_es5 && npm run dist_es2015_min && npm run dist_es5_min

author: SaltyRTC Contributors
